meta.title: Webdev
meta.summary: Listing out my misc notes in article form.

content:
Featured

I have a bunch of notes on random things I catalog here.

The article contents may stray from the page title.

Contact charles.karpati@gmail.com should you have any revisions, questions, comments, or concerns!


Fonts, Unicode & ASCII – Working with text rendering, encoding, and character sets. Notes


JavaScript – Core JavaScript concepts, browser scripting, and interactive logic. Notes


Visualization Notes – Techniques and tools for effective data visualization. Notes


Websites – Development, structure, and deployment of web applications. Notes
